item.title: Openssl
item.description: Fetch Server SSL certificate We need to trust a SSL certificate before we can communicate with a SSL server. To download the SSL certificate we can use following command: openssl s_client -showcerts -servername <server hostname> -connect <server hostname>:443 </dev/null Example Example openssl s_client -showcerts -servername 'google.com' -connect 'google.com:443' </dev/null Create Self Signed Root CA Certificate Create key pair for creating certificate openssl genrsa -des3 -out <key file>.key 2048 # or openssl ecparam -out <key file>.
